name: What Do We Do Meow?
description:
Your girlfriend cat is moving away and you are about to be in a long distance relationship. Many couples in this situation ask the question, "What do we do now?" You are running out of cash to pay for your phone data plan, so you need to do some odd jobs to keep in contact with your girlfriend. What happens when you can't pay? To what lengths will you go to pay your bills? Will the relationship last? Earn money through a series of odd jobs to try and make things work in this brief, yet heart-wrenching story-game.

Created with Kijun Seo, Sam Fields, Brandon Jarvinen, and Daniel Tjandra at the Global Game Jam 2015.
